key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks, including fines for AML and data privacy violations
Economic sensitivity to South Korean market fluctuations
Cybersecurity threats due to reliance on digital platforms
Intense competition from traditional banks and fintech companies
Legal disputes and potential reputational risks
controversies: KB Securities fined 3.8 billion won for mishandling customer data and violating capital market regulations
Legal dispute involving Kookmin Best Insurance Co. over coverage obligations in a stabbing incident
social_issues: Data privacy concerns due to mishandling of customer data
governance_issues: Effectiveness of recent leadership changes remains uncertain

sources.title: KB Financial Unit Wins Insurance Dispute Over Store Stabbing
